p:
The COVID-19 infection, caused by the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus, can lead to an acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and multiple organ failure.
3 Few reports have been published regarding the COVID-19 and pulmonary manifestations in SCD patients to date. 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 To our knowledge, no case of a pregnant woman with SCD and COVID-19 infection has been related until now.
